page.title: 16TEENAGE UNEMPLOYED, UNSTONE.
page.content: Girl, age 19, single, at home with widowed mother. "Attended special school at 14, after truanting secondary. Two yrs.,left May 1982, age 16. One CSE in English. "Youth Training Scheme, pet shop. Govt. wages Â£25 pw. Scheme finished 6 months. Waste of time; shop took on new YTS girl. "On dole 1 yr.Â£19 pw.(Wages would be Â£60_Â£80 pw.) No study improve chances. "Began second YTS, painting & decor., Community Indus. Like factory but Gov. project. Â£40 pw. but Â£2 tax. Lasted 1 yr.,decorated churches, community halls. Enjoyed it. Like permanent job. Unable set up own, lack of money. "Second YTS ended May 1985. Back on dole, Â£28 pw. No interviews. Offered third YTS 3 days pw. Â£53, may take it. "Don't know how view future; no jobs about. Probably be on dole some time."
